tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nanotechnology_research_publications (
  publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title TEXT,
  author TEXT,
  published_date DATE,
  abstract TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE metadata_table (
  publication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  publication_date DATE,
  authors TEXT[],
  keywords TEXT[],
  abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE publications_metadata (
    publication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    authors TEXT[],
    publication_date DATE,
    abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE nanotech_publications (publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
publication_title VARCHAR(255),
publication_author VARCHAR(255),
publication_year INT,
publication_abstract TEXT,
publication_keywords VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE publication_authors (author_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
author_name VARCHAR(255),
author_affiliation VARCHAR(255),
author_email VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE publication_categories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
category_name VARCHAR(255),
category_description TEXT)

CREATE TABLE publication_references (reference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
publication_id INT,
foreign key (publication_id) references nanotech_publications(publication_id),
reference_title VARCHAR(255),
reference_author VARCHAR(255),
reference_year INT)

CREATE TABLE publications (
    publication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    authors TEXT[],
    publication_date DATE,
    abstract TEXT
);
